response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to revolutionize its industry. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, representing years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $850,000. This opportunity is not only about acquiring a valuable asset but also about being part of an exclusive community that appreciates the craftsmanship and quality we stand for. We believe in creating lasting relationships and would be honored if you choose to join us on this journey. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to potentially welcoming you as a valued owner of this masterpiece.", "product_price": 850000}
